Subject: Beginning Your Home Music Studio
Description: Filker Tom Smith talks about how to start your own home music studio.  Speakers include:Tom Smith - Track: DIY, Media  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Tom Smith Concert
Description: Apparent Nifty Guest In Perpetuity Tom Smith is back, with new songs, a new album (a kids' album! Must be the apocalypse), and the usual assortment of catchy tunes and lousy puns.  Speakers include:Tom Smith - Track: Penguicon, Media  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Literary Filk
Description: Authors from Peter Beagle to Jerry Pournelle have included bits of song and poetry in their fiction, and and many SFF stories have been set to music.  Join local Filkers as they discuss the hows and wheres of placing songs in fiction and sing some songs from their favorite books.   Speakers include:Clif Flynt, Mark Bernstein, Tom Smith - Track: Media  - Duration: 50 minutes
